movie.title: The Current: The Story of George Stinney, Jr
movie.plot: This is the story of George Stinney, Jr, black male age 14 who was the youngest person ever to be executed in the U.S. It happened in 1944 in South Carolina. He was convicted of murdering two young white girls.

events.title: Betty June Binniker and Mary Emma Thames are murdered
George Stinney J is sentenced to death
George Stinney Jr is executed by electrocution
